email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000 MT, and we are offering a lumpsum rate of USD 450,000 under CFR terms. The vessel is MV OCEAN TRADER, DWT 65,000, LOA 225m.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The lumpsum rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you provide a breakdown of the rate? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The lumpsum rate includes freight, port charges, and bunker adjustment factor. The laycan is 25-30 September. We can adjust the rate to USD 430,000 if you can confirm the booking by tomorrow.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 430,000 is more reasonable. Can you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window? Also, please provide the vessel's ETA at Newcastle.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Demurrage and ETA
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours. MV OCEAN TRADER is expected to arrive at Newcastle on 24 September. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Everything looks good. We accept the lumpsum rate of USD 430,000 and the demurrage rate of USD 8,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Booking is confirmed. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Lucas
